Articles.Content:
HI, I am trying to open KSP on a Mac but it will not load. once I click resume game, and yes I did have saves, It will just stop and all of the options for resume game will just turn grey.

I run KSP version 24.2 on a MAC. 32 bit. I tried opening other threads but I could not access it. Any help will be great. Thanks.
Please see the stickied Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide post in this forum. There's not enough information in your post to help. Also, what do you mean by you "tried opening other threads"?

There are a few links hereabouts which link to help threads which have since been archived. They're not accessible anymore. If you can let me know which threads you found links to aren't accessible, I'll check them over and move them back to the public view if they're useful.

As to this issue... if you hit Alt+F2 and check the logs for error messages once you've tried to Resume Game, it should tell you if there's a file it can't read. Typically, this indicates a busted persistent.sfs in one of your saves. You'll either need to restore it to a backup or a recent quicksave (by copying the relevant file in and renaming it to persistent.sfs), or you'll have to delete the save.
